DataElement.preferredName: Patient Hormone Replacement Or Immunosuppressive Therapy Yes No Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The yes/no response to a question that asks if the patient received hormone replacement or suppressive therapy.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Patient Hormone Replacement Therapy Or Immunosuppressive Therapy
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary._Treatment with estrogens or estrogen/progesterone after menopause or ovariectomy to prevent pathological effects of decreased estrogen production._An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise._deliberate suppression of immune system function for experimental or therapeutic purposes.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A person who requires medical care.

Concepts.definition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: actions or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process (NCI).
